lyrics.text: Everytime i think about you and miss you, i find you in front of me
you are always a head of my dreams,
and you tell me my words
i've never seen with you but the most beautiful and sweet nights
love that has never crossed my mind before or even ever imagined
Ohh everytime i hear the word love i think of you
ohh i fear for you from all the feelings that i got for you
every dream we dream was a dream about us now its in our hands
and that's not normal ( doesnt happen a lot)
there's no place for me but in your heart,
your heart always calls for me:"come tell me"(come talk to me)
tell me how can you miss me at the same time i miss you(tell me how u miss me whenever i miss you)
your love is my day and your eyes are my night
كل ما افكر فيك واشتاق لك
يا ده انا من كتر مشاعرى
هو انا ليا مكان غير قلبك؟
